ygData.subject: How is embedded links handled in heritrix 1.10.x with attribute 'scope-embedded-links' removed from LinkScoper
ygData.msgSnippet: We are migrating to from Heritrix 1.8 to Heritrix 1.10.1. Now, the attribute scope-embedded-links , which are set to true in our templates have now been

Subject: How is embedded links handled in heritrix 1.10.x with attribute 'scope-embedded-links' removed from LinkScoper

We are migrating to from Heritrix 1.8 to Heritrix 1.10.1.
Now, the attribut=
e 'scope-embedded-links', which are set to true in our templates have now b=
een removed from LinkScoper.

I am attaching an example of the kind of the =
order.xml we are using.
